metadata.synopsis: Plays when Emperor sees the githyanki in the Knights of the Shield Hideout.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter at the KotS hideout, entering one of these triggers: S_LOW_Elfsong_Basement_GithEntranceS_LOW_Elfsong_Basement_GithEntrance_000

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: Githyanki... Vlaakith has found us. Get rid of them. Quickly!

1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
1.text: Githyanki? What are they doing here...? Get rid of them.
